statements: SELECT * FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC, booking_time ASC, total_cost DESC;
SELECT booking_id, booking_type, total_cost FROM bookings WHERE status = 'confirmed';
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, booking_time FROM bookings WHERE total_cost > 500 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT booking_id, booking_type, status FROM bookings WHERE booking_date = '2022-05-15' AND total_cost BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, total_cost FROM bookings WHERE booking_type LIKE 'Family%' ORDER BY booking_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC, total_cost ASC;
SELECT booking_id, booking_type, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE status='pending';
SELECT booking_id, booking_type, booking_time FROM bookings WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT booking_id, status, total_cost FROM bookings WHERE booking_type='meeting' ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT booking_id, booking_time, total_cost FROM bookings WHERE booking_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT flight_number, departure_date FROM flights WHERE airline='Delta';
SELECT id, booking_reference, booking_date FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT booking_reference, user_id FROM bookings WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE airline = 'Delta Airlines';
SELECT flight_number, departure_date, arrival_date FROM flights WHERE departure_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT booking_reference, booking_date, booking_type FROM bookings WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT booking_reference, booking_date, booking_type FROM bookings WHERE booking_type = 'Business' ORDER BY booking_date ASC;
SELECT booking_reference, booking_date, booking_type FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT destination, departure_date FROM flights ORDER BY departure_date DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, location, price FROM hotels WHERE price < 200;
SELECT activity_name, location, start_time, end_time FROM activities WHERE location = 'beach';
SELECT * FROM flights JOIN hotels ON flights.destination = hotels.location;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE destination = 'Paris'
SELECT hotel_name, location, price FROM hotels ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT activity_name, location, start_time, end_time FROM activities WHERE location = 'Beach' AND start_time > '10:00:00'
SELECT * FROM flights JOIN hotels ON flights.destination = hotels.location
SELECT * FROM hotels JOIN activities ON hotels.location = activities.location
SELECT * FROM flights;
SELECT flight_id, airline, departure_date, arrival_date FROM flights WHERE departure_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT hotel_id, hotel_name, location, price FROM hotels ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT activity_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM activities WHERE end_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT booking_id, user_id, booking_date, total_cost FROM bookings WHERE total_cost > 500 ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_airport = 'JFK';
SELECT hotel_name, location, price FROM hotels WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT activity_name, start_date, end_date FROM activities WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT flight_id, departure_date, arrival_date, departure_airport, arrival_airport FROM flights WHERE departure_date >= '2022-01-01' AND departure_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY departure_date ASC;
SELECT booking_id, user_id, total_cost FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-04-30';
SELECT * FROM Flights;
SELECT airline_name, departure_date, arrival_date FROM Flights WHERE flight_number = 12345;
SELECT * FROM Hotels WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT location, start_time, end_time FROM Activities WHERE location = 'Beach';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Users WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM Flights WHERE departure_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM Hotels WHERE rating >= 3 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT hotel_name, location, rating FROM Hotels WHERE rating IS NOT NULL AND price < 200 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Activities WHERE start_time < '12:00:00' OR end_time > '14:00:00';
